mapper.insert: insert into APP_YDBP_AREA (DISP_SEQ, AREA_ID, AREA_NAME, AREA_ID_L2, AREA_NAME_L2, AREA_NAME_TM, AREA_ID_TM) values (#{dispSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaIdL2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaNameL2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaNameTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaIdTm,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into APP_YDBP_AREA
DISP_SEQ,
AREA_ID,
AREA_NAME,
AREA_ID_L2,
AREA_NAME_L2,
AREA_NAME_TM,
AREA_ID_TM,
#{dispSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaIdL2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{areaNameL2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaNameTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaIdTm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select: SELECT DISP_SEQ, AREA_ID, AREA_NAME, AREA_ID_L2, AREA_NAME_L2, AREA_NAME_TM, AREA_ID_TM FROM APP_YDBP_AREA ORDER BY DISP_SEQ,AREA_ID_L2,AREA_ID_TM
SELECT DISTINCT DISP_SEQ, AREA_ID, AREA_NAME FROM APP_YDBP_AREA ORDER BY DISP_SEQ
SELECT DISP_SEQ, AREA_ID, AREA_NAME, AREA_ID_L2, AREA_NAME_L2, AREA_NAME_TM, AREA_ID_TM FROM PUB.APP_YDBP_AREA ORDER BY DISP_SEQ,AREA_ID_L2,AREA_ID_TM
SELECT AREA_ID_L2 FROM APP_YDBP_AREA WHERE AREA_NAME_L2 = #{name} and rownum <=1
SELECT area_id from APP_YDBP_AREA where area_name=#{name} and rownum <=1
mapper.insert: insert into APP_YDBP_AREA_4t (DISP_SEQ, AREA_ID, AREA_NAME, AREA_ID_L2, AREA_NAME_L2, AREA_NAME_TM, AREA_ID_TM) values (#{dispSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaIdL2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaNameL2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaNameTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaIdTm,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
